statements: SELECT * FROM Species_Diversity
SELECT species_name, environment FROM Species_Diversity WHERE population_size > 100
SELECT species_name, genetic_variation FROM Species_Diversity WHERE environment = 'Forest'
SELECT * FROM Species_Diversity ORDER BY species_name ASC
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM Species_Diversity WHERE genetic_variation < 0.5
SELECT * FROM Species_Diversity WHERE environment='Forest' ORDER BY species_name DESC, population_size ASC;
SELECT species_name, population_size, genetic_variation FROM Species_Diversity WHERE population_size > 1000 AND genetic_variation < 0.5;
SELECT species_name, environment FROM Species_Diversity WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%' OR environment='Ocean' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, environment, population_size, genetic_variation FROM Species_Diversity WHERE environment='Mountain' AND genetic_variation BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.3 ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT COUNT(species_id) AS total_species, AVG(population_size) AS avg_population FROM Species_Diversity WHERE genetic_variation > 0.2;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, environment FROM species WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT species_id, species_name, population_size FROM species ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, environment, population_size FROM species WHERE environment = 'Forest';
SELECT genetic_id, species_id, population, allele_frequency FROM genetic_data WHERE allele_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM species WHERE environment = 'Forest' ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT species_name, population_size, environment FROM species WHERE population_size > 1000 AND environment = 'Jungle' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_id, AVG(allele_frequency) AS average_allele_frequency FROM genetic_data GROUP BY species_id HAVING AVG(allele_frequency) > 0.5;
SELECT species_name, population, allele_frequency FROM species JOIN genetic_data ON species.species_id = genetic_data.species_id WHERE population > 5000 ORDER BY allele_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM Species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, environment FROM Species WHERE environment = 'Forest';
SELECT species_name, rate_of_change FROM Species JOIN GeneticDrift ON Species.species_id = GeneticDrift.drift_id;
SELECT species_id, diversity_index FROM Diversity WHERE diversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE environment='Forest' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, environment FROM Species WHERE species_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT d.diversity_index, s.species_name, g.rate_of_change FROM Diversity d JOIN Species s ON d.species_id = s.species_id JOIN GeneticDrift g ON d.drift_id = g.drift_id WHERE d.diversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT s.species_name, COUNT(*) AS total_species_count FROM Species s JOIN Diversity d ON s.species_id = d.species_id GROUP BY s.species_name ORDER BY total_species_count DESC;

SELECT s.species_name, g.rate_of_change, d.diversity_index FROM Species s LEFT JOIN Diversity d ON s.species_id = d.species_id LEFT JOIN GeneticDrift g ON d.drift_id = g.drift_id ORDER BY d.diversity_index DESC, g.rate_of_change ASC;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, environment FROM species;
SELECT population_id, population_size FROM populations;
SELECT individual_name, age, gender FROM individuals;
SELECT environment_name, temperature, humidity, terrain FROM environments;
SELECT species_id, species_name, environment FROM species ORDER BY species_id DESC;

SELECT individuals.individual_id, individuals.individual_name, species.species_name, populations.population_size FROM individuals JOIN species ON individuals.species_id = species.species_id JOIN populations ON individuals.population_id = populations.population_id WHERE individuals.age > 5 ORDER BY populations.population_size DESC, individuals.individual_name ASC;
SELECT environments.environment_name, AVG(environments.temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(environments.humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM environments GROUP BY environments.environment_name;

SELECT species.species_name, COUNT(*) AS total_individuals FROM individuals JOIN species ON individuals.species_id = species.species_id GROUP BY species.species_name HAVING total_individuals > 10 ORDER BY total_individuals DESC;
SELECT individual_name, age FROM individuals WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, environment FROM Species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, environment FROM Species WHERE environment = 'forest';
SELECT genetic_id, drift_rate FROM GeneticData ORDER BY drift_rate DESC;
SELECT species_name, environment FROM Species WHERE environment = 'ocean' OR environment = 'desert';
SELECT * FROM Species ORDER BY species_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT species_name, environment FROM Species WHERE species_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT Species.species_id, Species.species_name, Environment.environment_name FROM Species JOIN Environment ON Species.environment = Environment.environment_name;
SELECT GeneticData.species_id, AVG(GeneticData.drift_rate) AS avg_drift_rate FROM GeneticData GROUP BY GeneticData.species_id;

SELECT Species.species_name, Population.population_size, Diversity.diversity_index FROM Species JOIN Population ON Species.species_id = Population.species_id JOIN Diversity ON Species.species_id = Diversity.species_id;
